ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Druzzil Ro Migration Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, Verant did move accounts, not chars, so every char got moved if you registered one.  But hey..  I ve got a guy in my guild that play three characters
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, Verant did move accounts, not chars, so every char got moved if you
registered one. But hey.. I've got a guy in my guild that play three
characters simultaneously and two or three others people that play two
simultaneously. That takes multiple accounts and multiple computers. When
a guild officer creates a mule, it's handy that it's not on the same account
so that he can trade items with himself. Two computers and DSL will work
just fine for that.

So the next time your significant other is giving you grief about EQ, tell
them it *could* be worse. ;-)

[47 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work


> From: "Brangwen" <brangwen@...>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> Subject: [eqbards] Druzzil Ro Migration Update
>
>
> > From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
> >
> > see. In fact a couple of guild officer's mule characters were
> left behind
> > with loads of runes, pages, gate potions, dragon loot, fbss's, ykeshas,
> etc.
> > that he had stored.. yech. So I've got to say this wasn't for the
>
> I thought that they were moving all the players chars?? or was this a
> separate account??? (that would be the only explanation I'm thinking).
>
> Good luck and enjoy!!
>
> ======
> Brangwen Incantare
> 28th Level Wood Elf Bard
> The Rathe
